TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed LIBFLAGS extends System.Enum

remarks.format: ## Remarks For additional information about the `LIBFLAGS` enumeration, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.LIBFLAGS LIBFLAG_FCONTROL = int16(2)

Docs.summary: The type library describes controls, and should not be displayed in type browsers intended for nonvisual objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.LIBFLAGS LIBFLAG_FHASDISKIMAGE = int16(8)

Docs.summary: The type library exists in a persisted form on disk.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.LIBFLAGS LIBFLAG_FHIDDEN = int16(4)

Docs.summary: The type library should not be displayed to users, although its use is not restricted. Should be used by controls. Hosts should create a new type library that wraps the control with extended properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.LIBFLAGS LIBFLAG_FRESTRICTED = int16(1)

Docs.summary: The type library is restricted, and should not be displayed to users.
